src:
Cristian U fue denunciado por abuso sexual simple
Un joven inició acciones legales contra el ex Gran Hermano, a quien acusa de haberlo manoseado. Los detalles.

01 Nov 2019, 19:09

Angel Cuello, conocido popularmente como Ángel Sesarin, denunció en la Justicia a Cristian Urrizaga por abuso sexual simple. La causa está en manos del juez Alberto Baños del Juzgado Criminal N° 38. 
"Fue el viernes pasado en una fiesta de cumpleaños que se realizó en un boliche. Él estaba festejando su cumpleaños. Cuando estábamos en la puerta me decían que él estaba hablando y me apuntaba a mí con el celular. Cuando estábamos por entrar me dijo ‘hola rey, cómo estás’ y me tocó la pera. Ni mis amigos me tocan la cara", , explicó el joven en diálogo con Ulises Jaitt en El Show del Espectáculo.
"Yo estaba contento porque me había saludado, después le pedí una foto y ahí es donde me abraza tocándome. Después me toco la cola y me preguntó: ¿Eso come bien? Él antes le venía dando like a mis fotos de Instagram. Me shockeó y me quedé al lado de mi amigo. Adentro él se acercó a una de las que estaba en mi grupo y no sé qué le dijo. Cuando estaba bailando me miraba a cada rato. En una de esas me acerco a él, se tocó su miembro y me dijo ‘mirá rey, esto es para vos’. Me suele suceder con gente del ambiente", explicó el joven. 
“Tengo miedo a que me llegue a pasar algo o que en el boliche los amigos de él me quieran pegar. Es un tipo agresivo, violento”, aseguró.
Consultado sobre cuándo tomó la decisión de denunciarlo ante la Justicia, dijo: "El sábado, cuando caí, decidí denunciarlo. Estoy cansado de que porque son gente de la tele tienen poder para darte algo a cambio. Me cansé".
Ángel contó que ya había pasado por situaciones similares con famosos: "Te dan algo a cambio de o te ofrecen cosas. Varios famosos me han dicho cosas o que llamo la atención. Yo me siento re acosado. Hace poco estuve participando en un programa en el que me hicieron dar vuelta para ver cómo tenía la cola. No me gusta que se zarpen conmigo. De chico pase cosas feas y por eso no quiero que se zarpen".
Sobre si Cristian se comunicó con él después de aquella situación, dijo: "No porque lo tengo bloqueado. En el celular tengo llamadas perdidas de números privados y a mí nunca me llaman por teléfono".
Por último, al preguntarle qué haría si lo tuviera frente a él, expresó: "Le diría que me da asco. Yo antes lo admiraba, lo iba a ver a ‘Combate’. Se me cayó su imagen. Cuando hice un casting (para ese programa) él me decía que tengo facha y hablaba de mi cara. Me pegó fuerte como un chirlo. Me pone mal, era un ídolo", cerró.
En 2016, el ex Gran Hermano quedó envuelto en un escándalo tras una pelea en un boliche, en el que un joven lo denunció por haberlo agredido, provocándole varias fracturas. En mayo de este año se conoció la sentencia donde fue condenado a dos años de prisión. En diálogo con Exitoína, el panelista explicó su versión, y apuntó contra el fiscal y la jueza por "extorsionadores".
text:
Cristian U was denounced for simple sexual abuse
A young man initiated legal action against the former Big Brother, whom he accuses of having handled it. The details.

01 Nov 2019, 19:09

Angel Cuello, popularly known as Ángel Sesarin, reported Cristian Urrizaga in Justice for simple sexual abuse. The case is in the hands of Judge Alberto Baños of Criminal Court No. 38.
"It was last Friday at a birthday party that took place in a bowling alley. He was celebrating his birthday. When we were at the door they told me that he was talking and was pointing at me with the cell phone. When we were about to enter he told me ' hello king, how are you 'and the pear touched me. Not even my friends touch my face, "explained the young man in dialogue with Ulises Jaitt in The Show of the Show.
"I was happy because he had greeted me, then I asked him for a photo and that's where he hugs me by touching me. Then he touched my tail and asked me: Does that eat well? He used to like my Instagram photos. He shocked me and I stayed next to my friend. Inside he approached one of those in my group and I don't know what he said. When he was dancing he looked at me every so often. In one of those I approached him, he touched his member and told me 'look king, this is for you'. It usually happens to people from the environment, "explained the young man.
“I am afraid that something will happen to me or that his friends want to hit me in the bowling alley. He is an aggressive, violent guy, ”he said.
Asked when he made the decision to denounce him before Justice, he said: "On Saturday, when I fell, I decided to denounce him. I am tired that because they are people on TV they have the power to give you something in return. I got tired."
Angel said that he had already gone through similar situations with celebrities: "They give you something in exchange for or offer you things. Several celebrities have told me things or that I call attention. I feel re-harassed. I was recently participating in a program in the one that made me turn around to see how I had the tail. I don't like to get away with me. As a kid, ugly things happen and that's why I don't want them to leave. "
On whether Cristian contacted him after that situation, he said: "Not because I have it blocked. On the cell phone I have missed calls from private numbers and they never call me on the phone."
Finally, when asked what he would do if I had him in front of him, he said: "I would tell him that it makes me sick. I used to admire him, I was going to see him in 'Combat'. I dropped his image. When I did a casting (for that program) he told me that I have a facade and talked about my face. He hit me like a squeak. It makes me bad, it was an idol, "he closed.
In 2016, the former Big Brother was involved in a scandal after a fight in a bowling alley, in which a young man reported him for assaulting him, causing him several fractures. In May of this year the sentence was known where he was sentenced to two years in prison. In dialogue with Exitoína, the panelist explained his version, and pointed against the prosecutor and the judge for "extortionists."
